meanings.definition: The act of sending sexually explicit messages or images electronically.
meanings.sent1: Sexting can be risky if you send messages to strangers.
meanings.sent2: I heard about sexting in the news and learned it can be dangerous.
meanings.sent3: My friend got in trouble for sexting in class, but it was just a misunderstanding.
meanings.sent4: The dangers of sexting are often underestimated by young people.
meanings.sent5: Parents should talk to their kids about the risks of sexting early on.

meanings.definition: To engage in the practice of sending sexually explicit messages or images electronically.
meanings.sent1: She was caught sexting with her boyfriend during class.
meanings.sent2: People should think twice before sexting someone they don't know well.
meanings.sent3: The teacher joked that she caught the students sexting instead of paying attention.
meanings.sent4: Sexting can have serious consequences if the messages are shared without permission.
meanings.sent5: He regretted sexting his ex-girlfriend after they broke up.
